title: Dear riot: please stop trying to make me play champs that take skill
body:
I was pretty upset, even outraged, learning that the new swain had multiple skillshots. I played him a couple games and went ~0/10 each time becuase I REFUSE to aim more than one skill shot per champion that I play.

All these champion reworks that add skill shots are making me mad, because my roster of champions has been reduced to garen akali and irelia and guess who they're reworking next?

Irelia

Just waiting for that all skill shot kit, so a preemptive thank you to riot for ruining my life
